data.name: Animation
data.info: They were working for both show/hide. Now some of the screens only work on show, not hide. Need to sort out the show/hide on the Address Book button.

data.name: ngAnimate
data.info: The goal is to move away from explicit keyframes and use ngAnimate to handle transitions.

data.name: Directives, What Directives?
data.info: The quick and dirty approach: $rootScope is all over the place. Need to create more/better services and directives.

data.name: Unit Tests
data.info: Um, yea, need to fix/create. Not much point yet since it's all a hack and I need to refactor into more modular pieces. Yes, tests are useful for regression. However this is more of a playground application and I keep rewriting big chunks just to see what happens. Do not expect anyone in their right mind to take this and run with it.

data.name: Dynamic Colors
data.info: Bubbles should only nest two or three deep. However I would still like to calculate the colors based on number of parent categories and the levels down into the search.

data.name: Dynamic Placement
data.info: Bubbles are tied to a predifined div and location on the screen. these should be dynamic and self organizing relative to each other's location.

data.name: Weird Bug
data.info: In the browser console when loading the Search view, there's a 404. Apparently this is coming from the ng-repeats for the businesses that load an image. The collections are empty, so not sure why it is attempting to load the image src.
